events.name: Appsterdam phpBB Hackathon
events.about:
From Nov 9th to Nov 12th 2012 phpBB contributors will come together in Amsterdam to work on cool new features, squash bugs, write documentation and to improve infrastructure. Youre invited to come and help out! All tickets are free, but we ask that you signup so we can make sure there is enough space available and so there will be lunch and beverages for everyone.

Each day starts at 9am with breakfast (and coffee!). After a brief discussion we split into groups to work on the various projects. Before lunch we will come together to show each other the progress weve made and after lunch we split into groups again. Around 6pm well have a last meeting to discuss each projects progress. Afterwards well head out for dinner and drinks and meet again the next morning.

Appsterdam was kind enough to offer to host us. Check out their website to see what else they do and which other events they organize!

events.name: Music Hackday Amsterdam
events.about: The Amsterdam Music Hack Day is a full weekend of hacking in which participants will conceptualize, create and present their projects. Music + software + mobile + hardware + art + the web. Anything goes as long as its music related.
